name: Bold Thunderbolt
description:
You are playing for machanic-mage, your goal is to electrificate all this kingdom.

Are you playing Tinder? You know what you need to do. See ya.

Controls:

1. Click on left button with leftmouseclick.

2. Click on right button with leftbuttonclick.

Please, use Alt+F4 to close the game. Or restart you PC.

Game by  Sergei Zadorin & Maria Savchenko. And Hideo Kojima in our hearts.
